resources.string:
"PlutoActivity as a base Activity extends AppCompatActivity and contains Handler,Toast,PlutoDialog,AppManager,NetworkUtil,SoftInputManager and CommonAsyncTask.

" "1.Simplely you can make your all activities extends PlutoActivity.
" "2.Following under usage example of components in PlutoActivity.
"

"PlutoFragment as a base Fragment extends ProgressFragment which extends Fragment, and also is the same to PlutoActivity containing Handler,Toast,PlutoDialog,AppManager,NetworkUtil,SoftInputManager and CommonAsyncTask.

" "1.Simplely you can make your all Fragments extends PlutoFragment.
" "2.Following under usage example of components in PlutoFragment.
"

"PlutoDialog as a common defined material style Dialog that it both has system default style and some other commonly used dialog.The all you can make it easy to using in project

" "1.Simplely you can make dialog.
" "2.Following under usage example.
"
